title: 1.12.2最新版工业电压问题~
author: Smoke_S
txt_content: 1.12.2最新版工业电压怎么调，在配置文件怎么调？大佬指导~

replies.author: 鹿小语
replies.txt_content: 请问LZ是要调电压大小还是想把电压引起的爆炸关了

replies.author: 恋
replies.txt_content:
config/ic2.nin
enableEnetExplosions 
enableEnetCableMeltdown
这两个改成false

replies.author: Smoke_S
replies.txt_content:
